column2: title=Hobbit Recipes or Cooking with Hobbits
date=[[2006]]<ref>[http://www.tolkienlibrary.com/press/1017_A_Hobbit_Cookbook_Winegar.php A Hobbit's Cookbook] at [[Tolkien Library]] (accessed 26 December 2011)</ref>

column1: '''''Hobbit Recipes or Cooking with Hobbits''''' is a cookbook inspired by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[Hobbits]].

column2: This fine collection of Hobbit culinary delights has been collected and annotated by that renowned Hobbitish scholar; Gamling Wort. Herein he leads us ‘big folk’ through some wonderful and mouth-watering dishes. Mushrooms and rabbit, naturally, abound ~ enjoy!Book includes; 36 pages, 32 recipes, 35 line illustrations by Cornelius Clifford, colour cover. Size approx: 8.25 by 5.5 inches (210 x 145 mm)}}
